comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: The city of Ostend in Belgium has a popular sea beach. For those who don't recognize them, the wheeled cottages are bathing machines. The bathing machines at Ostend can also be seen in the Detriot Publishing photochrome at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsc.05702

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: klynslis and infrogmation:  Thanks for the information about the date and the city of Ostend. We will update our source data and reload the description.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Oostende, the City that never Sleeps - Only foto' s of Oostende, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
